report.title: Was an Amazing Experience
report.author: Epyon
report.bodytext: So I have taken Marinol a couple of times recently. I keep hearing people say its not that good compared to weed. /n /n 11:00 pm - I took 10mg on an empty stomach. /n /n 11:30 pm - I felt a little high so I took another. /n /n 11:45 pm - Holy crap I was high. It was amazing. The high was better than any I had from smoking and I didnt smell like pot, which I thought was a great plus. /n /n 12:00 am - I got incredibly hungry and the worst dry mouth ever. /n /n My high lasted until around 2 or 3. Was an amazing experience.
